summary: Two screenwriters in a rut come up with a story idea starring a bankable cowboy and the baby of the studio's waitress.
cast: James Cagney|Pat O'Brien|Marie Wilson|Ralph Bellamy|Frank McHugh|Dick Foran|Bruce Lester|Ronald Reagan|Paul Clark|Penny Singleton|Dennie Moore|Harry Seymour|Bert Hanlon|James Stephenson|Curt Bois|Loia Cheaney|Eddie Conrad|Hal K. Dawson|Otto Fries|John Harron|George Hickman|Jan Holm|Bert Howard|Nenette Lafayette|Carole Landis|Vera Lewis|Peggy Moran|James Nolan|John Ridgely|Cliff Saum|Mary Ann Such|William Telaak|Rosella Towne|Dorothy Vaughan|Pierre Watkin
title: Boy Meets Girl
